double.name: Playback rate
double.description: Sets the playback rate, or speed of the media, to that referred by dRate. 1.0 represents normal speed, while 2.0 represents twice the normal speed of the media, for example. Not supported on the GStreamer (Unix) backend.

double.name: Volume
double.description: Sets the volume of the media from a 0.0 to 1.0 range to that referred by dVolume. 1.0 represents full volume, while 0.5 represents half (50 percent) volume, for example. Note: The volume may not be exact due to conversion and rounding errors, although setting the volume to full or none is always exact.

value.name: wxMEDIACTRLPLAYERCONTROLS_NONE
value.description: No controls. Return wxMediaCtrl to its default state.

value.name: wxMEDIACTRLPLAYERCONTROLS_STEP
value.description: Step controls like fastforward, step one frame etc.

value.name: wxMEDIACTRLPLAYERCONTROLS_VOLUME
value.description: Volume controls like the speaker icon, volume slider, etc.

value.name: wxMEDIACTRLPLAYERCONTROLS_DEFAULT
value.description: Default controls for the toolkit. Currently a combination for wxMEDIACTRLPLAYERCONTROLS_STEP and wxMEDIACTRLPLAYERCONTROLS_VOLUME.
